name: Savage Strike
description: A ferocious assault, tearing through defenses with raw, unbridled power

name: Blitz Barrage
description: A relentless storm of blows, making defense nearly impossible.

name: Vicious Assault
description: An unstoppable force that crushes adversaries beneath its relentless barrage

name: Mighty Impact
description: A move that transcends the battlefield, embodying the grandeur of a legendary hero. Each strike is a testament to unparalleled strength and unwavering resolve, leaving a trail of awe in its wake.
